name: Learning School Driving Academ
description:
Real Learning School Driving Academy free game

Learning Car & Bus Driving School simulator game is the real driving simulator that will learn you to drive many different cars & bus with different citys. Learning Car game features some amazing environments like cities, snow city ,country roads, highways, deserts, mountains, etc...

Learning Car & Bus Driving School simulator game is free to play no extra charge for playing a game.
Use a virtual steering wheel or many other control options that suit your needs. Gain more knowledge of the road rules with this intuitive driving simulator.this game a tech a follow traffic rule.

After a Demo tutorial that will teach you all the rules in a closed Driving course you will enter a large, open city. Everything you’ve learned will be put to the test there in multiple missions that you will approach in a variety of different cars and Bus.

Learning with fun !! this game is awesome for car mania and parking mania player..

More than 100 levels with different driving conditions are waiting for you. Show off your driving skills, get your driving license now! Play Learning Car & Bus Driving School simulator !!

Features

=> Smooth and realistic real physic car handling 
=> Dynamic traffic in whole the city
=> Different licenses to take, Car, Bus
=> Free Ride mode -carrier mode- challenges mode in this game\
=> Multiple cameras including First Person view for full immersion
=> More than 80 challenging levels
=> Detailed vehicle interiors
=> Tilt steering, buttons and touch steering wheel
=> Online Leaderboards and Achievements
=> Real engine sounds
=> Realistic weather conditions
=> Request new maps and vehicles on our social media pages!
=> Controller Support, play with your Gamepad!
